constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 62 (Monday, April 12, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Ms. NORTON:
H.R. 2452.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
clause 18 of section 8 of article I of the Constitution.
[Page H1727]

latestAction.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Water, Oceans, and Wildlife.

title: Pittman-Robertson Wildlife Restoration Act and Dingell-Johnson Sport Fish Restoration Act District of Columbia Equality Act of 2021
